price: 29 Tous ceux qui peuplent les cieux et la terre Lui expriment sans cesse leurs besoins. A chaque instant, Son œuvre se manifeste.
arabic: يَسۡـَٔلُهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ كُلَّ يَوۡمٍ هُوَ فِي شَأۡنٖ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: yasaluhu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi kulla yawmin huwa fī shanin
